description: A madman takes over a Gotham church, and only batman can bring him out before the house of God is reduced to a pile of smoldering rubble. But the madman's capture begins a journey of discovery for Captain Jim Gordon, one which takes him back to the streets of Chicago, for a confrontation with a scandalous past he thought he'd left behind forever (DC solicitation)
name: Loyalties Part 1 of 3

volume.name: Batman: Legends of the Dark Knight

description: In this issue Markey Marshmallow, Smore and their babysitter meet Professor Fluffernutter while searching for Markey's older brother, Johnny. Once the professor explains that there is a marshun invasion in the works it is time for the adventure to begin.

name: The Big Red Slay

description: This comic uses photos + artwork along with word balloons containing dialogue.

volume.name: Tigers Of Terra: Families Of Altered Wars

description: Battered, bruised, but unbowed, John Constantine gets ready to launch his offensive against Isabelle's killer, laying a complex trap that takes him even deeper into the London underworld. "Haunted" part 3.
name: Haunted, Part 3

description: Sonic, Knuckles, Amy and Tails give an entertaining and astonishing demonstration of their amazing abilities on Station Square TV, Eggman is watching! A mysterious new robot he has created downloads all of their abilities, along with a few extra talents it witnesses. Of course, Eggman plans to send the souped-up robot out to destroy our star-struck heroes. Can Knothole Village's media darlings possibly defeat an enemy that does all they can do and more?
name: Camera Hog

volume.name: Tigers Of Terra: Families Of Altered Wars

description: An object found off the Azores coast and a discovery in a Greek monastery perched on meteors lead Martin Mystère  to the discovery of a " lost library " in Luxor , perhaps linked to the ancient Altantis . But the " detective of the impossible " did not reckon with the ghostly Men in Black ..
name: Gli uomini in nero

Reprints back-up stories from Magnus # 1, 3, 4, 6 - 10.
Reprinted in The Aliens # 2 (Whitman) in 1982.
Also reprinted in:
Captain Johner and the Aliens # 1 & 2 (Valiant) in May, 1995.
name: Captain Johner & The Aliens

description:
THE RESURRECTION OF MA GNUCCI PART 2

Punisher’s gained the help of Charlie Schitti, the only man left to his family’s name. But will Charlie be enough in stopping the resurrection of Ma Gnucci? Another twisted installment from masterminds Garth Ennis and Steve Dillon!
name: The Resurrection of Ma Gnucci; Part Two

story_arc_credits.name: Punisher: War Zone-The Resurrection of Ma Gnucci

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: Punisher: War Zone-The Resurrection of Ma Gnucci

description:
Overview

Despite the efforts of the alien Vision, the unimaginably powerful Gah Lak Tus module draws into its core the energies of the A.I.M. orbital research station and then makes landfall on Earth. And this lone instrument may accomplish what countless of its robotic brethren could not—the utter destruction of our helpless planet.

Publisher: Whitman,
Reprints The Aliens (Gold Key) # 1 from 1967 
 
Variant:  White logo cover (see pic below).
name: Captain Johner & The Aliens

person_credits.name: Russ Manning
person_credits.role: writer, artist, penciler, letterer, inker, cover

description:
Milions of vampires have descended upon America. In a desperate bid to defeat them, the US military nuked New York City. Unfortunately, it was too little, too late. The Beast is everywhere and it's unstoppable.

But roaming across New York is Vlad, the ancient Wallachian Prince who knows very well this enemy and would do whatever it takes to stop the demons again.

One of the worst blizzards in history cripples New York City in one fell swoop. But the blinding cold and snow are the least of the city's worries. For aboard a drifting cargo ship stirs an unfathomable evil that will unleash a horror the likes of which the world has never seen. And in two nights, New York City will be no more...

NYC Homicide Detective Victor Dailey lost his wife to cancer, and he's now a barely functioning alcoholic. Knowing that he needs a change of scenery, Dailey has decided to retire early and move away from NYC. Unfortunately for Dailey, a ravenous vampire army has launched an all-out attack against Manhattan. And no one is getting out alive.

Vlad Tepes has spent the last 500 years in limbo, waiting for the vampires to re-emerge and unleash their brutal attacks against humanity. With New York City in ruins, Vlad has at last returned to fulfill his destiny?annihilate the vampires, no matter the cost. Everyone and everything is expendable.
